data.title: 20 North Carolina News YouTubers You Must Follow in 2024
data.meta_description: The best North Carolina News youtube channels from thousands of YouTubers on the web ranked by subscribers, views, video counts, and freshnessrn
data.text:
CBS 17

CBS 17 WNCN-TV is the local CBS affiliate serving Raleigh, Durham, Fayetteville and surrounding communities in North Carolina, U.S. We share award-winning journalism, professional-quality content, and powerful human stories. This channel is not for breaking daily news or weather forecasts. We want to start conversations, so please let us know what you think of our content. Go ahead. We can take it.

Youtube Channel youtube.com/channel/UC1dV.. Subscribe

YouTube Subscribers 271KType Macro Frequency 15 videos / day Since Sep 2006

WCNC

Official YouTube channel of WCNC Charlotte. Get more of the Carolinas' leading news and weather at http://www.wcnc.com/

Youtube Channel youtube.com/channel/UC-Rx.. Subscribe

YouTube Subscribers 248KType Macro Frequency 30 videos / day Since Feb 2017

WRAL

Looking for the latest Raleigh, North Carolina news? Look no further than the WRAL YouTube channel. Broadcasting from our headquarters in downtown Raleigh, NC, our local reporters in the Research Triangle Park area are dedicated to bringing you the most up-to-date information on what's happening in our community. Our coverage area includes, but is not limited to Raleigh, Durham, Fayetteville, Chapel Hill, Rocky Mount, Morrisville, Clayton, Cary, Garner, Wake Forest, Apex, Fuquay-Varina, and Holly Springs. Enjoy daily National News Updates so make sure to Subscribe, Share, and leave...

Youtube Channel youtube.com/channel/UCfmk.. Subscribe

YouTube Subscribers 237KType Macro Frequency 8 videos / day Since Jul 2009

Queen City News

Carolinas' Own Queen City News - WJZY, virtual channel 46, is a FOX-affiliated television station serving Charlotte, North Carolina, United States that is licensed to Belmont. The station is owned by Nexstar Media Group, as part of a duopoly with Rock Hill, South Carolina-licensed MyNetworkTV affiliate WMYT-TV. Thanks for stopping by Carolinas' Own Queen City News YouTube channel! We're proud to bring you local stories, breaking news, in-depth investigations, Charlotte-area weather, and more! Subscribe to Queen City News YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/myfoxcarolinas/videos ...

Youtube Channel youtube.com/channel/UC6YN.. Subscribe

YouTube Subscribers 190KType Macro Frequency 9 videos / day Since Jun 2010

WLOS News 13

WLOS ABC 13 News serves the Asheville, NC area and the rest of western North Carolina and Upstate South Carolina. We keep our audience informed through local news, weather forecasts, traffic updates, notices of community events, sports and entertainment programming since 1954. Follow WLOS on social media: WLOS ABC 13 News on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/News13/ WLOS ABC 13 News on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WLOS_13 WLOS ABC 13 News on Instagram: https://instagram.com/wlos_13 For all of the day's top local and national news, visit http://www.wlos.com Watch our live newscasts and...

Youtube Channel youtube.com/channel/UCu0G.. Subscribe

YouTube Subscribers 110KType Macro Frequency 1 video / day Since Feb 2011

ABC11

ABC11-WTVD has been serving the Heart of Carolina for more than 60 years. Our station offers the latest local news, weather, traffic and sports for the Raleigh-Durham and Fayetteville areas.

Youtube Channel youtube.com/channel/UCe7c.. Subscribe

YouTube Subscribers 147KType Macro Frequency 22 videos / day Since Jan 2011

WFMY News 2

Youtube Channel youtube.com/channel/UC6Uc.. Subscribe

YouTube Subscribers 97.1KType Micro Frequency 5 videos / day Since Feb 2017

WXII 12 News

WXII12.com is your top source for North Carolina breaking news, weather and daily local news coverage and beyond. Look to WXII 12 for political coverage, must-see videos and more from the Triad's NBC affiliate.

Youtube Channel youtube.com/channel/UC0Zs.. Subscribe

YouTube Subscribers 60.7KType Micro Frequency 8 videos / day Since May 2007

The News & Observer

News from The News & Observer, serving Chapel Hill, Durham, Cary, Eastern and Southwest Wake, Garner, Clayton, Smithfield, North and Midtown Raleigh.

Youtube Channel youtube.com/channel/UCASQ.. Subscribe

YouTube Subscribers 127KType Macro Frequency 2 videos / week Since Sep 2013

WSOCTV9

This is the official page for WSOC-TV Channel 9 in Charlotte. We are your go-to source for breaking news and severe weather coverage for the Carolinas.

Youtube Channel youtube.com/channel/UCXOE.. Subscribe

YouTube Subscribers 71.3KType Micro Frequency 1 video / day Since Jan 2012

FOX8 WGHP

Start local and stay local with FOX8 WGHP for breaking news, weather and sports for Greensboro, High Point, Winston-Salem and all across North Carolina. Visit MyFOX8.com to check out our interactive weather radar, podcasts, true crime investigations, polls and more. Follow us! Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fox8news/ Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/myfox8 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/myfox8 TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wghp8 Website: https://myfox8.com/

Youtube Channel youtube.com/channel/UCBy_.. Subscribe

YouTube Subscribers 46.2KType Micro Frequency 16 videos / day Since May 2007

WBTV News - Charlotte

This is the official page for WBTV News (CBS) in Charlotte, North Carolina. WBTV has been 'On Your Side' for more than 70 years as the first TV broadcaster in the Carolinas.

Youtube Channel youtube.com/channel/UCXez.. Subscribe

YouTube Subscribers 21.2KType Micro Frequency 13 videos / day Since Jun 2020

WWAY NEWS

This is the Place for News, Weather and Sports in Southeastern NC. @ABC, @CBS and @TheCW affiliate. Leland, North Carolina

Youtube Channel youtube.com/channel/UC_BD.. Subscribe

YouTube Subscribers 4.1KType Nano Frequency 4 videos / week Since Aug 2016

WHKY NEWS

News and the Crime Report from WHKY in Hickory, NC. News Arrest Disclaimer: The individuals depicted have been arrested but not convicted at the time of story postings. This information does not infer or imply guilt of any actions or activity other than their arrest. We make no warranty or guaranty as to the accuracy of this data.

Youtube Channel youtube.com/channel/UCtiI.. Subscribe

YouTube Subscribers 12.6KType Micro Frequency 4 videos / day Since Nov 2013

WECT News 6

WECT, Where News Comes First is Southeastern North Carolina's News Leader on air, online, on mobile and now on your Roku! As your source for the best local news, weather, sports and entertainment coverage, WECT offers hours of news every week, making this the perfect place to watch live or catch up on anything you may have missed.

Youtube Channel youtube.com/channel/UCHT2.. Subscribe

YouTube Subscribers 2.6KType Nano Frequency 30 videos / week Since Dec 2022

WCTI NewsChannel 12

Youtube Channel youtube.com/channel/UCOxw.. Subscribe

YouTube Subscribers 2.6KType Nano Frequency 23 videos / week Since Jul 2011

WFAE News

WFAE is a major source of news and information for the Charlotte region and one of the country's leading public radio stations. WFAE reaches over 200,000 listeners each week and offers a broad range of award-winning national, international and regional news from National Public Radio (NPR), the BBC, Public Radio International, American Public Media and WFAE's newsroom. WFAE produces a weekday signature talk show, 'Charlotte Talks With Mike Collins.' WFAE is an independent, nonprofit organization, licensed to the University Radio Foundation Inc. with frequencies in Charlotte...

Youtube Channel youtube.com/channel/UCAOc.. Subscribe

YouTube Subscribers 2.9KType Nano Frequency 5 videos / quarter Since Apr 2007

Carolina News Today WNCP-TV

Student-produced news from coursework at University of North Carolina at Pembroke.

Youtube Channel youtube.com/channel/UCOpK.. Subscribe
